body_html: activate is typically only used if you install TensorFlow in a virtualenv. Since you don't appear to have done this, you should be able to use TensorFlow straight away, e.g. by running python and typing import tensorflow as tf at the prompt.
body_text: activate is typically only used if you install TensorFlow in a virtualenv. Since you don't appear to have done this, you should be able to use TensorFlow straight away, e.g. by running python and typing import tensorflow as tf at the prompt.
body: `activate` is typically only used if you install TensorFlow in a virtualenv. Since you don't appear to have done this, you should be able to use TensorFlow straight away, e.g. by running `python` and typing `import tensorflow as tf` at the prompt.
